section_1_paragraph: This website uses cookies and similar technologies to ensure the proper functioning of the site and to enhance your experience of interacting with it. Below, we explain how we use cookies and how you can manage them.
section_2_paragraph: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your computer or mobile device when you visit websites. They are widely used to ensure the proper functioning of the site and to collect information about your usage of the site.
section_3_paragraph: We use cookies for the analytics service and functional cookies. These cookies help us gather anonymous information about how users interact with our website. We use this information for analysis and to improve the user experience.
section_4_paragraph: Upon your first visit to our site, you will be presented with a modal window where you can choose whether to consent to the use of cookies.
section_5_paragraph: By continuing to use our site after making a choice in the modal window, you confirm your consent to the use of cookies in accordance with our Cookie Policy.
section_6_paragraph: We may update our Cookie Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and if necessary, we will notify you of significant changes.
section_7_paragraph: If you have any questions or comments regarding our Cookie Policy, please contact us at <email></email>.
